definitions.definition: ( intransitive ) To have a particular direction ; to run ; to stretch ; to tend .
examples: The shore of the sea trends to the southwest.

definitions.definition: ( transitive ) To cause to turn ; to bend .
( social media , intransitive , informal ) To be the subject of a trend; to be currently popular , relevant or interesting.
examples: What topics have been trending on social networks this week?

main_definition: ( intransitive ) To have a particular direction ; to run ; to stretch ; to tend .
secondary_definitions: ( transitive ) To cause to turn ; to bend .
( social media , intransitive , informal ) To be the subject of a trend; to be currently popular , relevant or interesting.

definitions.definition: To cleanse or clean (something, usually wool).

main_definition: To cleanse or clean (something, usually wool).
